DOC.brief_summary: To increase access evidence base psychotherapy Veterans Posttraumatic Stress Disorder , propose offer train intensive consultation community-based provider Cognitive Processing Therapy Posttraumatic Stress Disorder . However , believe many clinician may implement Cognitive Processing Therapy take advantage consultation initial training . For reason , propose examine effectiveness enhance training method , would add Motivational Interviewing standard Cognitive Processing Therapy training . Motivational Interviewing form collaborative discussion strengthen motivation commitment change . We hypothesize augment standard Cognitive Processing Therapy train technique reduce provider ' reluctance fully implement intervention .
